select.clearSelection.developer_comment: Aria label for the clear selection button in select components

select.noOptions.developer_comment: Message shown when no options are available in select components

select.loading.developer_comment: Message shown when select options are loading

select.empty.noResults.developer_comment: Message shown when no search results are found in select

select.empty.noItems.developer_comment: Message shown when no items are available in select

calendar.nextMonth.developer_comment: Aria label for the next month button in calendar components

calendar.previousMonth.developer_comment: Aria label for the previous month button in calendar components

calendar.nextYear.developer_comment: Aria label for the next year button in calendar components

calendar.previousYear.developer_comment: Aria label for the previous year button in calendar components

calendar.today.developer_comment: Aria label for the today button in calendar components

calendar.selectedDate.developer_comment: Description for selected date in calendar components

calendar.selectedDateRange.developer_comment: Description for selected date range in calendar components

loadingSpinner.default.developer_comment: Default loading message for loading spinners

datePicker.time.hour.developer_comment: Label for hour input in date picker

datePicker.time.minute.developer_comment: Label for minute input in date picker

datePicker.time.second.developer_comment: Label for second input in date picker

datePicker.time.am.developer_comment: AM time period label in date picker

datePicker.time.pm.developer_comment: PM time period label in date picker

datePicker.time.enterTime.developer_comment: Aria label for time input field in date picker

datePicker.time.enterTimeHour.developer_comment: Aria label for hour-only time input in date picker

datePicker.time.enterTimeHourMinute.developer_comment: Aria label for hour and minute time input in date picker

datePicker.time.enterTimeHourMinuteSecon.developer_comment: Aria label for full time input with seconds in date picker

datePicker.clearInput.developer_comment: Aria label for clear input button in date picker

numberInput.increment.developer_comment: Aria label for increment button in number input

numberInput.decrement.developer_comment: Aria label for decrement button in number input
